#include "bits/stdc++.h"
using namespace std;
const int N = 100001;
int cnt[2][N] = {0};
int n;
int inp1 , inp2;
int mn;
int ans = N;
int main(){
    scanf("%d" , &n);
    mn = (n + 1) >> 1;
    while(n--){
        scanf("%d %d" , &inp1 , &inp2);
        ++cnt[0][inp1];
        ++cnt[1][inp1];
        cnt[0][inp2] += (inp1 != inp2);
    }
    for(int i = 0 ; i < N ; ++i){
        if(cnt[0][i] >= mn){
            ans = min(ans , max(0 , mn - cnt[1][i]));
        }
    }
    if(ans == N)
        printf("Impossible");
    else
        printf("%d\n",ans);
}
